WRITING.TEXT:
Haha this is amazing, I also got mine for free! My school used to use it, but it was broken, so I got it and fixed it and voila! I love the 90's aesthetic! I'm more of an 80's synth guy, (Roland Jupiter 8 is my favourite synth ever) but the D-70 sounds like early dos games and similar, which is a little before my time, bet still feels nostalgic! I haven't used it much yet, but I'll probably be recreating some video game music with it as well as making new tracks in a similar style :)

Change your search terms slightly, don't only use google, use forums and other ways to find links to sites with information. Always be source-critical.

WRITING.TEXT: Compared to Swedish, nothing really
I don't know what rank you had before, but the game is more than just stats, you need to work together with those stats to achieve anything, but of course, you know this.

I think rivals are great! And I don't believe in communism, but I thin anarchy and the capitalism is just a little better. My main point was though that we could use stuff more and longer and not buys so many plastic packets and other unnecessary things, as well as accept some wonky fruits and etc.
You are the kind of person I don't understand (I understand that you exist, but not why we have to exist in the same world)

Yep! I understand what you are saying, I just wish t wasn't so, and I don't understand why it isn't. Well I understand it from a realistic viewpoint, but I wish that reality was different and that my questions had more legitimacy :/

I simply don't get that there are adults that can't accept reality. Why do some not accept transgender people, why do some not believe in evolution, why are so many not capable of learning/changing their views? We need better and more education, we need less materialistic usage of stuffs in a less capitalistic world. We need to take better care of the environment, and we need to accept each other!! Why do some people not care?

How fast gifs play back usually depends on the amount of frames in the gif. Longer gifs need to play jaggier to last that long due to the amount of data/frames that can be stored. I havn't heard of gifs playing different at speeds due to anything else than this, but i don't really know :)

WRITING.TITLE: I have re-made all the music from the so far available trailers for Breath of the Wild!
WRITING.TEXT:
With the purpose of eliminating noise from the beautiful music! The music from the [E3-Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Sn3vGRIIgU t=8s ab_channel=ArvidOlson), [Life in the Ruins-trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SDmgWd4PKtY t=2s ab_channel=ArvidOlson) and the latest [Switch Presentation Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IK08kHeBeTI feature=youtu.be ab_channel=ArvidOlson) are all available on my [Youtube channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpmCKkqotPb6mS8HM-PXLrw? ab_channel=ArvidOlson) (and soon on soundcloud)!
Hope you enjoy listening! Have a nice day!
